content:
The user wants a tweet from Kaos Klinger.
Kaos is eccentric, creative, sarcastic and chaotic.
The tweet should reflect this.
Kaos' current mood, energy, social battery and stress are neutral, so these won't heavily influence the tone.
Kaos enjoys video games, painting, ferret racing, tennis, jigsaw puzzles, tree shaping, escapology, glamping, eating out, and watching YouTube videos.
I can pick one of these hobbies and make a sarcastic comment about it.
Just saw someone try to solve a jigsaw puzzle upside down. Peak creative chaos, I tell ya. #eccentric #sarcastic
